casebody.data:
McALLISTER TOWING & TRANSPORTATION COMPANY, Inc., Libelant-Appellee, v. THE Steamship CONTE GRANDE, Societa Italia, Claimant-Appellant. No. 415. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 21, 1934. Loomis, Williams- & Donahue, of New York City (Homer L. Loomis, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Purdy & Purdy, of New York City (Prank C. Mason, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
